duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and manage customer relationships, selling food and non-food items to achieve sales and profitability goals.
Manage deliveries, troubleshoot order process issues, and communicate with clients for account receivable collection.
Identify prospective customers, develop new business, and stay informed about market conditions, product innovations, and competitors' products.
Drive to existing customers and prospects to ensure product delivery, including lifting/carrying up to 75lbs.
